summary: A Flax module that encapsulates a RoBERTa model tailored for token‑level classification tasks, providing setup and a callable forward pass to produce per‑token predictions.
business_intent: Enable developers to integrate and fine‑tune a RoBERTa‑based token classification component within JAX/Flax NLP pipelines for applications such as named entity recognition, part‑of‑speech tagging, or any sequence labeling use case.
